DOC.brief_summary: To determine effect HIV-1 immunogen ( Remune ) AIDS-free survival , define time prior development AIDS-defining condition death .
DOC.brief_title: A Multicenter , Double-Blind , Phase III , Adjuvant-Controlled Study Effect 10 Units HIV-1 Immunogen ( Remune ) Compared Incomplete Freund 's Adjuvant ( IFA ) Alone Every 12 Weeks AIDS-Free Survival Subjects With HIV Infection CD4 T-Lymphocytes Between 300 549 Cells/microL Rega
DOC.detailed_description: Patients receive 10 unit HIV-1 immunogen IFA IFA alone every 12 week , follow 104-148 week .
DOC.criteria: Inclusion Criteria Concurrent Medication : Allowed : Antiretrovirals stable dose least past 3 month . Patients must : HIV1 infection CD4 count 300549 cells/mm3 . No AIDSdefining condition . Been stable dose antiretroviral past 3 month , take antiretrovirals . NOTE : KS permit require systemic therapy . Prior Medication : Allowed : Prior antiretrovirals . Exclusion Criteria Concurrent Medication : Excluded : Systemic chemotherapy KS . Treatment malignancy basal cell squamous cell carcinoma skin carcinoma situ cervix . Patients follow prior condition exclude : History illness would interfere study . Acute infection require prescription therapy within past month , genital herpes oral vaginal candidiasis . Prior Medication : Excluded : Prior HIV1 Immunogen . Unwilling use effective safe sex practice . Active substance abuse .
